title: Domestic teams with the most players at the 2018 World Cup
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players for 12 number of Teams.
The Number of players is appeared to be the highest at Team Manchester City and lowest at Team Atlético Madrid.
The difference of Number of players between the highest and lowest Team is 7.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of players in each Team on the y axis.
The maximum Number of players 16.0 is found at Team Manchester City and the minimum is found at Atlético Madrid where Team is 9.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players for 12 number of Teams.
The Number of players is appeared to be the highest at Team Manchester City and lowest at Team Atlético Madrid.
The difference of Number of players between the highest and lowest Team is 7.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players for 12 number of Teams.
Team Manchester City has the highest Number of players and Atlético Madrid has the lowest Number of players.
The difference of Number of players between the highest and lowest Team is 7.0.
Number of players at Team Manchester City is 16.0 , second place is Real Madrid at 15.0, and thirdly is FC Barcelona at 14.0.
Team Tottenham Hotspur, FC Paris Saint-Germain, and Chelsea FC have a similar Number of players that is 12.0.
The average Number of players in all 12 Teams is 11.75.
The Number of players is 141.0 if we add up values of all Teams.
